snippet: A report by Agence France-Presse on Thursday pointed to court papers filed June 26 that characterized Nelson Mandela’s life-threatening condition.
lead_paragraph: A report by Agence France-Presse on Thursday pointed to court papers filed June 26 that characterized Nelson Mandela’s life-threatening condition.

headline.main: South African Government Denies Mandela Was in ‘Vegetative State’
